The headline on neonnettle: com inaccurately describes the House bill as a law, claiming that joining 'Soros Funded' Antifa is now illegal and punishable by 15 years in prison.
The House bill: called the Unmasking Antifa Act of 2018, was introduced but has not become law and there has been no action on the bill since its introduction.
The bill: if it became law, would not make "joining" the group illegal, but it would punish individuals in disguise, including while wearing a mask, who injure, oppress, threaten, or intimidate any person exercising their rights or privileges secured by the Constitution or laws of the United States. The punishment could include fines, imprisonment for up to 15 years, or both.
